message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price of $110. It's a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a deal like this anywhere else. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. I'm willing to meet you halfway and make a deal, but I'm not willing to go above that price. Can you consider it?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Bob. However, I'm afraid I need to make a bit more profit on this deal. I'm willing to compromise, but I can only go up to $108. What do you think?
I understand your position, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $106. Can you consider it?

I appreciate your flexibility, Bob. I can see you're serious about making a deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to get closer to my target. I can offer it to you for $109. Let me know if that works for you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway again, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'll make one more offer: $107. Can you consider it?
